text: An advanced practice registered nurse may:
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 2-3306.4.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-99, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 3-1201.01.

For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-247, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 3-1201.01.

DC CODE § 3-1206.04

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Initiate, monitor, and alter drug therapies;
Make referrals for appropriate therapies or treatments; and
Perform additional functions within his or her specialty determined in accordance with rules and regulations promulgated by the board.

title.text: District of Columbia Boards and Commissions. (Refs & Annos)

subchapter.text: Advanced Registered Nursing; Scope of Practice; Requirement of Protocol; Collaboration. (Refs & Annos)
